name: Laser Hundo
description:
The only way to live in this nightmare prison of lasers and hell demons is cold hard cash. Shoot and dodge your way to a sweet hundred bucks.

Use arrow keys to move.
Use W or Z or up to jump.
Use X to shoot.
There's some hot controller support action if you wanna hunt that hundo in style.

Art, Design, Programming - Tom Smith (@TomSmizzle)

Music, Sound - Martin Falder (@BionicSheep)

Special Thanks: Laila Manlaykhaf, Andrew Fray, Jerry Mickle, David Fenn, All the spacepunks out there fighting demons to pay rent.
